title: UK inflation unexpectedly jumps to 3.6% as fuel and food prices rise
description: The figure for June marks the steepest increase in inflation, which measures how quickly prices are rising, since January 2024.
content:
Motor fuel prices push up inflation
Tom Espiner
Business reporter
There are always factors pushing up inflation, and always things dragging it back down.
The pace of price rises in June was pushed up by petrol and diesel prices, and offset by slower ... [363 chars]

title: HMRC criticised by watchdog for failing to track billionaires’ tax
description: Report comes as government faces growing demands for wealth tax to improve health of public finances after welfare U-turn earlier this month
content:
HM Revenue and Customs has been sharply criticised by parliament’s spending watchdog for being unable to track how many billionaires pay tax in the UK.
In a highly critical report on the collection of tax from wealthy individuals, the influential Pub... [3929 chars]

title: Robin Kaye: American Idol TV executive and her husband shot dead inside their Los Angeles home
description: "Robin has been a cornerstone of the Idol family since 2009 and was truly loved and respected by all who came in contact with her," a spokesperson for the show says.
content:
An American Idol TV executive and her husband have been found dead in their LA home.
Robin Kaye was a music supervisor on the long-running reality TV series.
The bodies of the 70-year-old and her husband Thomas were discovered after officers conducte... [1039 chars]

title: Ukraine war briefing: Don’t bomb Moscow, Trump says, after reportedly giving Zelenskyy the idea
description: Unclear which or how many Patriots Trump meant; concern in Congress about Putin having ‘another 50 days to grab territory’. What we know on day 1,239
content: Ukraine on Tuesday was waiting for further details of the “billions of dollars” worth of US military equipment promised by Donald Trump, amid confusion as to how many Patriot air defence systems will be sent . On Monday, Trump said an unnamed country... [3434 chars]

title: Trump launches probe into Brazil's 'unfair' trade practices
description: Last week, the US president urged Brazilian authorities to end their prosecution of the country's former President Jair Bolsonaro.
content: US Trade Representative Jamieson Greer said the probe was being launched at Trump's direction "into Brazil's attacks on American social media companies as well as other unfair trading practices that harm American companies, workers, farmers, and tech... [1075 chars]
